products.description: End-to-end B2B ecommerce platform for building digital storefronts tailored to business buyers. Enables custom catalogs, negotiated pricing, and self-service ordering for complex B2B transactions. Streamlines order management, payment, and fulfillment while integrating with ERP and CRM systems for unified operations.

Customer Data Platform (CDP) for B2B enterprises to unify customer data, deliver real-time insights, and orchestrate personalized marketing and sales campaigns. Empowers teams to collaborate on account-based strategies and automate engagement across channels using AI-driven intelligence.

Configure, Price, and Quote solution for managing complex product configurations, pricing, and quoting in B2B sales. Automates sales processes, ensures accurate pricing, and accelerates deal cycles by connecting with commerce and CRM platforms.

Platform for managing subscription-based sales of goods and services in B2B environments. Enables customers to create, monitor, and manage subscriptions with flexible billing and payment options, supporting recurring and mixed-order models.

Sales automation and CRM platform for managing leads, opportunities, and sales pipelines. Provides forecasting, analytics, and collaboration tools to help sales teams close deals faster and drive revenue growth.

Customer service and support platform for managing service requests, cases, and field operations. Delivers omnichannel support, knowledge management, and analytics to improve customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.

Marketing automation platform for executing targeted campaigns, managing customer journeys, and measuring marketing ROI. Integrates with CRM and commerce systems to deliver personalized experiences across channels.

Secure document exchange and integration platform for B2B partners, suppliers, and retailers. Automates business processes, ensures compliance, and provides visibility into end-to-end transactions and workflows.

Analytics and business intelligence platform for data visualization, reporting, and advanced analytics. Enables organizations to gain insights from enterprise data and support data-driven decision making across departments.
